# Dataset Description

This document provides metadata information for the dataset:

- **Title:** Transitions in Smartphone Addiction Proneness Among Children  
- **Creators:** Fong-Ching Chang, Jeng-Tung Chiang, Kun-Wei Lee, Szu-Yuan Hsu  
- **Publication Date:** June 6, 2019  
- **Persistent Identifier (DOI):** [10.5061/dryad.d1h80v0](https://datadryad.org/stash/dataset/doi:10.5061/dryad.d1h80v0)  
- **Source Repository:** Dryad Digital Repository  
- **Description:** This dataset explores transitions in smartphone addiction proneness among children, with a focus on gender differences and usage patterns.  
- **Data Format:** CSV  

# Metadata Files

The dataset has been documented using the `dataspice` package in R, generating the following metadata files:

- `access.csv` – Information on dataset access
- `attributes.csv` – Variable descriptions
- `biblio.csv` – Citation details
- `creators.csv` – Dataset authors
